j:translation_en.description: Learn the basics of page contribution: create a new page and add text and images to it. See how to preview your page before you publish it to make it available online.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Basics of page contribution

j:translation_de.description: Learn the basics of page contribution: create a new page and add text and images to it. See how to preview your page before you publish it to make it available online.
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Basics of page contribution

j:translation_fr.description: Learn the basics of page contribution: create a new page and add text and images to it. See how to preview your page before you publish it to make it available online.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Basics of page contribution

j:translation_en.description: Learn everything you need to know about NPM (Javascript) Modules and developer experience.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Introduction to NPM modules

j:translation_de.description: Learn everything you need to know about NPM (Javascript) Modules and developer experience.
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Introduction to NPM modules

j:translation_fr.description: Learn everything you need to know about NPM (Javascript) Modules and developer experience.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Introduction to NPM modules

j:translation_en.description: Content types are used by editors to easily create content in a page or folder, by filling out a form. Follow this tutorial to see how to create new content types.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Content type definitions

j:translation_de.description: Content types are used by editors to easily create content in a page or folder, by filling out a form. Follow this tutorial to see how to create new content types.
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Content type definitions

j:translation_fr.description: Content types are used by editors to easily create content in a page or folder, by filling out a form. Follow this tutorial to see how to create new content types.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Content type definitions

j:translation_en.description: See how to manage the files (such as images, documents, and folders) that you use in your pages and content. You will also see how to crop, resize, and rotate images.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Media Management

j:translation_de.description: See how to manage the files (such as images, documents, and folders) that you use in your pages and content. You will also see how to crop, resize, and rotate images.
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Media Management

j:translation_fr.description: See how to manage the files (such as images, documents, and folders) that you use in your pages and content. You will also see how to crop, resize, and rotate images.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Media Management

j:translation_en.description: Get familiar with the server administration panels embedded by default in Jahia
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Server administration

j:translation_de.description: Get familiar with the server administration panels embedded by default in Jahia
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Server administration

j:translation_fr.description: Get familiar with the server administration panels embedded by default in Jahia
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Server administration

j:translation_en.description: Focus on the Roles and permission administration panel: this is where you manage the roles used on your platform and their associated permissions
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Roles and permissions

j:translation_de.description: Focus on the Roles and permission administration panel: this is where you manage the roles used on your platform and their associated permissions
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Roles and permissions

j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Roles and permissions

j:translation_en.description: Learn about the basics of user profile data, including how profiles are tracked and the information they can store for later use across your digital experience platform.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Profile Data

j:translation_de.description: Learn about the basics of user profile data, including how profiles are tracked and the information they can store for later use across your digital experience platform.

j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Profile Data

j:translation_en.description: Improve your visitors' experience by personalizing content in your site. You will learn the basics of Visitor data, which is used to create conditions that apply to your content variants.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Adding Personalization

j:translation_de.description: Improve your visitors' experience by personalizing content in your site. You will learn the basics of Visitor data, which is used to create conditions that apply to your content variants.
j:translation_de.jcr:title: Adding Personalization

j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Adding Personalization

j:translation_en.description: Follow these tutorials to create templates, views and components using Jahia NPM (Javascript) Modules.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Getting started as a developer
